name: HOURS GHOST BUSTIN' BOT
description:
DELABOT was not signed into CANVAS but was working on his homework and forgot to log his hours!  The hours came back to haunt him in the form of ghosts (because this is a video game)!!!!!  

Good thing DELABOT has a stockpile of apples.  Hurl the apples at the ghosts to vanquish them and catch up on those unlogged hours!

Work through the basement, the mansion, and the attic to win!

Use SPACEBAR to throw apples.

Use the directional arrows on your keyboard to move.  

Each floor has 12 ghosts!  Find them and make them disappear before time runs out!
